short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A magic extension helper for displaying and converting dates

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A magic extension helper for displaying and converting dates

Supported formats:
• UTC
• ISO
• Local
• Timestamp

Now with the magic ability to adjust dates – for example:
>>  Mon Oct 23 2017 20:42:02 GMT+1100 (AEDT)
>> Add 2 hours
>>  Mon Oct 23 2017 22:42:02 GMT+1100 (AEDT)
